question: What is the most common method of social engineering?
You are walking down a very busy road when you see a thumb drive on the ground. It is in a very obvious place, and you don't see anyone going towards it. What should you do?
You are about to play an online game with your friend, when you get a notification from the website that viruses have been detected on your device. What type of attack is this?
What information can you share online?
Which of the following are signs that you have received a phishing email?
choice1: The URL in the message is different from the URL when your mouse cursor hovers over the link
choice2: The name of the organization is misspelled
choice3: The sender's email address is different from the organization they claim to be from
